mapper.select: SELECT CONTRACT_PRICE.CONTRACT_PRICE_NO, CLIENT.CLIENT_NAME, CONTRACT_PRICE.CONTRACT_SDATE, CONTRACT_PRICE.CONTRACT_EDATE, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME, CLIENT.MANAGER_NAME, CONTRACT_PRICE.CONTRACT_PRICE_STATUS FROM CONTRACT_PRICE INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON CONTRACT_PRICE.PRODUCT_NO = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE ON CONTRACT_PRICE.EMPLOYEE_NO = EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NO INNER JOIN CLIENT ON CONTRACT_PRICE.CLIENT_NO = CLIENT.CLIENT_NO
